meanings.definition: The quality or state of being harmless.
meanings.sent1: The harmlessnesses of the puppy made it a favorite among the children.
meanings.sent2: The harmlessnesses of the herbivore allowed it to peacefully graze in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The harmlessnesses of the kitten led to a playful chase around the garden.
meanings.sent4: The harmlessnesses of the dove symbolized peace and tranquility in the painting.
meanings.sent5: The harmlessnesses of the teddy bear made it a comforting companion for the child.

meanings.definition: The act of causing no harm or damage.
meanings.sent1: The harmlessnesses of the bubble wrap ensured the fragile items were protected during shipping.
meanings.sent2: The harmlessnesses of the apology helped mend the relationship between friends.
meanings.sent3: The harmlessnesses of the prank made everyone laugh instead of getting upset.
meanings.sent4: The harmlessnesses of the rain shower refreshed the thirsty plants in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The harmlessnesses of the feather duster gently cleaned the delicate ornaments.
